topic.title: Library Overview
topic.shortdesc: A broad-scoped view of the components that make up Swift Mailer

body.p: In this chapter we will take a brief tour of the various components which all put together form Swift Mailer as a whole. You will learn some key terminology used through the rest of this books and you will gain some understanding of the classes you will have access to.
In the chapters following this one we will look at many of these components in more detail, working with short code examples as we go.
